00129 class BambooLookupListener : public LookupListener
00130 {
00131   private:
00132     Bamboo* overlay;
00133 
00134   public:
00135     BambooLookupListener(Bamboo* overlay)
00136     {
00137         this->overlay = overlay;
00138     }
00139 
00140     virtual void lookupFinished(AbstractLookup *lookup)
00141     {
00142         overlay->lookupFinished(lookup);
00143         delete this;
00144     }
00145 };
